name: url-unshortener
title: URL Unshortener
description: Unshorten or expand those pesky shortened links in your clipboard or text selection, enhancing your privacy and security.
author: SebDanielsson

commands.name: unshorten-url-no-gui
commands.title: Unshorten URL to Clipboard
commands.description: Unshorten URL from current selection or clipboard to the clipboard.

commands.name: unshorten-url
commands.title: Unshorten URL Action
commands.description: Unshorten URL from current selection or clipboard and choose action.
